Candidates

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.6″]

Candidates Overview

It’s all about you!

For over 20 years, H.I.M. Recruiters has been building successful relationships with some of the most exciting and prestigious employers across the United States and even Internationally. Some of our past and present employers include:

  • Acute Care Hospitals
    • Large to Small
    • Chains to Individual
    • Non-Profit and for Profit
  • Consulting Firms
    • DRG Validation
    • CDI
    • ICD-10
    • Revenue Cycle
    • Chargemaster/Charge Capture
    • EHR Design/Implementation
    • Sales
    • and Numerous Other Roles
  • Health Care Organizations
  • Corporate Offices
  • Vendors
  • Transcription Services
  • HIM Education Programs
  • Professional Associations
    • AHIMA
    • and Others

Our long-term and successful employer relationships can be your ticket to the opportunity you’ve always been looking for.

But great clients are not all that make H.I.M. Recruiters different. Our Consultants & Managers recognize that you, our candidates, are our most valued resource. We take the time to get to know you and your career aspirations. We pride ourselves on building long-standing, rewarding relationships where you are treated with respect.

Our career management skills have assisted candidates, like you, in building their careers over time. Most have lead to long-term relationships where we have placed a number of candidates up to three times. We believe in The Power of People, which means we listen and we care!

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
